CustomField.description: Number of days in current S75 status. This will be wiped on each status change.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "AUSTRAC Registered"), !ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Registration__c, "New Registration") ) , 0 , CASE(TEXT(S75_Status__c), "New", TODAY() - S75_Status_New_Date__c, "Issued", TODAY() - S75_Issued_Date__c, "Returned", TODAY() - S75_Returned_Date__c, "Submitted to WU", TODAY() - S75_Submitted_To_WU_Date__c, "AUSTRAC Issued", TODAY() - AUSTRAC_Issued_Date__c, "Missing Information", TODAY() - S75_Missing_Information_Date__c, "Submitted To AUSTRAC", TODAY() - Submitted_To_AUSTRAC_Date__c, null) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of days that the S75 has been in its current status
CustomField.label: Number Of Days In Current S75 Status
